The weirdest game of Hockey you will ever play. 
Just can't recommend it with the way matchmaking works, or the way that people feel they have to play due to the invisible rating system that silently determines your worth, but does a terrible job at it by not actually grading you on your skill, but on how scummy you can play to get one over on the other "team" 
Oh wait, there aren't teams in this game.

An update is meant to improve the previous version but it kinda feels like we are back to prehistory. 垃圾游戏，越更新越玩不了，给我电脑显示无法启动，因为计算机丢失。还有无法找到此游戏的文件夹，还有64位版本的不兼容。我玩你妈。狗比游戏WDNMD，还老子钱！

Honestly? If you don't already have this game or you don't have friends to play with and just not take it seriously, don't buy this game. Simple.

The Community is overall pretty toxic, the Devs don't like when you have anything negative to say about the game even if it's constructive critisim, the game has a lot of bugs that have been there for ages and the Devs love to pick and choose which ones they deem "urgent". Let's also not forget that BHVR used NFTs and tried to hide it from their community until we forced them to tell us about it, and even then they just tried to hide it away again. I have been red ranks both on the survivor side ( as both solo q and full SWF) and killer side, and honestly killer side is so easy it bores me - but dedicated killer mains will love to say it's the hardest thing ever. In general the game has become boring no matter what side you play, solo q or SWF, no matter what it's just...boring. The latest map they added, "Eyrie of Crows", feels like it is unfinished and just looks rushed. The content in this game has only been going downhill for the last couple of years and it shows no signs of stopping, even with tons of their players leaving and never returning. If BHVR wishes to run this game into the ground and not take any truthful feedback from their long term players, then I say let them.

Just please don't get into this game if you haven't already or if you have other options out there to try first, at least not til the Devs actually start to show they care about this game again. There are better options out there, I promise.

Dead by daylight is an unbalanced game. Don't get me wrong, I enjoy playing it even though it has a couple of issues. But I want to warn some new players about playing this game. 

You see, like I said before it is unbalanced. And this can lead to some not fun situations. In my eyes playing survivors with friends is the most fun you can have. Because even if the killer in the game plays not in a fun way, with friends you can do some goofy things to make it fun again (which makes losing not so bad).

Solo queuing as survivor is something you should do if you have more experience with the game.  They changed the ranking system, so you should in theory be grouped with people of the same level, but it can happen that good and bad players will be grouped together. And because of that good players can sometimes get salty on the bad players, because they don't match their standard. So unless you can handle the salt or you can tolerate games not going your way because of teammates, I would suggest not solo queuing. 

And now playing killer (oh boy). As killer you should expect a lot of salt from the survivors. Because they will destroy you in the post game chat. The survivors expect that you as killer play to their standards so they have fun (even though they won't play the way that gives you the chance to play like that). For example they want you to not chase 1 or 2 survivors constantly. And I don't mean tunnelling, but chase all survivors equally. But in reality they will rush the generators, so you don't really have a choice if you want to secure a kill. If they even think that you are chasing a survivor too much, they will accuse you of tunnelling.

Because of this playing killer is less fun then playing survivor. Because as killer you need to sweat more in my opinion and you actually need to play like a D-bag (speaking from the standards of the survivors) to secure a kill. So if you don't handle salt in the chat that well, DON'T PLAY KILLER. 

Also I think most survivors who complain or give salt are players who mainly play survivor and never or barely played killer. So they have no idea how it is on the other side (I can know, because I was a survivor main). So if you are going to complain against your killers, you should first play it yourself. I think you only have the right to complain at the killers play style, if you experience the killers pressure yourself.

Things have improved since they made their major UI update and introduced a host of new issues. There are still bugs of course, they break it every update. 

It's kind of hard not to, at least to my understanding. 
They're not a major studio, and they specialise in what I would consider... awful games. 
Mobile, games about TV shows and movies, just a lot of.. games most people would not play.
(If you heard about the mobile game controversy involving Bethesda and Westworld, this is the studio responsible for the games.)
They're trying and they listen to the players, so that says a lot.

The game has become way more accessible with its skill check changes.

I have found this game to be much more enjoyable now, and they are working on trying to fix matchmaking, because right now.. the ranking system is kind of broken and only works well in theory. People are notorious for exploiting systems.

dn

I had heard of Dead by Daylight and seen it a couple of times but I didn't really get what it was about until I got it myself last year. I bought it with my friends to try and expierence it as a multiplayer coop experenice and slowly but surely it became an enjoyable game to play due to its customization options and teamwork mechanics. We are playing it pretty often these days and it's a lot of fun!

Pros
- Original gameplay
- You get 2 different expierences by playing either Survivor or Killer
- Lots of characters to choose from and a lot of Perks so there's a lot of customization
- Frequent updates that keep the game alive
- Daily challenges
- There's lore and stories if you want to understand more about the world

Cons
- Since it's an Asymmetric gaming expierence you might feel like it's unfair at some points
- The game doesn't have voice chat which is a game changer for survivors
- It's hard to manage your perks. You'll have to read them over and over again and learn the pictures if you wanna manage them and change them efficiently
- The queues are pretty slow at times

Overall Rating: 75/100

This game gives other games like Fortnite,ROBLOX,Among Us, and Apex Legends a run for their money.
This game is actually scary at times and you can have fun with friends too, a fresh game for me when i got too tired of all these battle royals.

Çıktığı dönem özellikle türünün neredeyse tek örneğiydi ekip olarak çok profesyonel olmasa da kendisini uzun süre oynatabilen belli bir noktadan sonra da geri dönüp bir çok yeni içerikle karşılaşabileceğiniz bir oyun.
 DLClerle oyun güzel bir şekilde destekleniyor ve her zaman oynanışı da güzelleştirme derdindeler oldu bitti diyip sadece para kazandıracak işler yapmıyorlar bu açıdan olumlu ama oyunun yapımcılarının da çok profesyonel olmadıkları ortada buna rağmen bu fiyata gayet alınıp oynanabilecek bir oyun. 

+ ''Yeni'' güncellenen grafikler
+ ''Yeni'' güncellenen hareket,jeneratör tamirleri vs
+ Yeterli sayıda katil ve hayatta kalmaya çalışan karakter sayısı
+ Bir çok yetenek sayesinde farklı farklı kombinler yapıp oynanışa ek şeyler ekleyebiliyorsunuz
- Optimizasyon iyi değil
- Bazen katillerin pusması ve oyunu kitlemesi (oyuncu bazlı sorun)
- Kaçma yollarının az olması
- Bazen oyun arama buga girebiliyor eğer internetiniz kötüyse o an, ama bu ne kadar oyunun problemi bilemiyorum.

(+/-) Oyunda belli bir seviyeye gelene kadar gerçekten zevkini alamazsınız tamamen odaklanıp kendinizi geliştirmeniz lazım o zaman asıl zevki ortaya çıkıyor hatta bu yüzden yeni başlayanlar katil çok güçlü diye ağlarken artık belli bir seviyeye gelmiş bir kitle ise hayatta kalanların daha güçlü olduğunu savunuyor.

I have been playing this game for  1000 hours now, and even though I had fun playing this game most of the time, there have been so many things in this game now that just ruin the game experience. 
Like for example the queue times and the not working matchmaking and mmr system. 
You have to wait an average of 10 mins to find a Lobby only to be paired with a rank 10 Killer with rank 20 teammates as a red rank survivor.
 When you play killer the queue times are way shorter but you still get paired with survivors that dont match your skill level.
Those are all issues that should already be fixed by now, but it seems like the devs are incapable of doing so.
Another thing that has ruined the game experience for many in the past few days is the new UI and the new animations. 
Everybody already hated the UI and animations when they were released on the PTB, the devs already got so many negative revievs and feedback back then, that they refused to listen to, and still released the UI and animations to the live servers. 
The new update also includes many new bugs like the hitbox being way to big and dead hard working even worse.

The devs have been ruining their own game now with many unnecessary changes that nobody asked for and nobody even remotly likes.
I hope that after that many negative revievs the devs start changing the way they treat the players and their opinions and stop ruining their own game, or I and many other people will stop playing the game completely.

I wasn't sure if I liked this game or not until the latest update came around. The hitboxes were already hot garbage. Now they're even worse somehow. The HUD went from "quite fine actually" to "dreadful", since the devs are blatantly ignoring any feedback they get from their community. Walls without collision, getting hit through pallets while the killer is getting stunned, flashlights being mostly useless as the angle apparently changes from patch to patch... The list goes on and on. 

Most game developers try to actually improve their game when they update it, but BHVR seems to see things differently. They call something a "ptb" (public test build), want to get people hyped, then ignore all feedback they get and push out whatever they have "accomplished" in as broken a state as it is in without any remorse. Then they get a doodoostorm and suddenly they "heard" the criticism that they oh so much didn't give a rats butt about mere hours earlier. Noice. 

Addendum I: Now there are bugs coming out of nowhere. Suddenly with the latest update killers can hit survivors through pallets without getting stunned. Also there are some bugs that enable survivors to climb rocks where killers can't reach them. Lag can happen too. How do those dedicated servers work actually? Imagine hanging on the hook for the second time, pressing the space button like a madman only to be killed by some random lag spike and the game saying: "nope, you didn't press space... now die!" Noice. 

Addendum II: Also imagine depipping (as a killer) because 3 people diconnect in first two minutes of the match. Noice.

   7/10 cause too fat to fit in bus

This game has more bugs than the starting forest area in Pokemon games. Some would even consider this game as the proper sequel to Pixar's movie "A Bug's Life", however the key difference between these two is that whilst A Bug's Life has a mediocre ending, Dead By Daylight will most likely not even start at all.

EasyAntiCheat is doing it's absolute best at preventing the game from properly working everytime you boot the game up. It's as if it finally considered the game as a virus filled with the lingering rage and sorrow of it's torned players souls. Sometimes in the game menu, if you listen closely, you can hear the desperate cries of these players that previously bought the game, wishing they had lost it all instead on $gme stocks.

If you ever succeed at starting a game, you will find that no one is really having fun. Everybody hates each other, and probably themselves to. Sometimes you will [b]eventually[/b] get matched with a killer playing on console, in which the game becomes a bullying simulator of the survivors running around, watching him contemplate his terrible life's decision at playing Dead By Daylight with controllers, as he has hit most of the static objects on the map.

Now for what it is, I absolutely shit my pants playing this game. Not knowing what some killers do beforehand because I can't read, having them rushing at you from an angle in which you thought the camera couldn't even go, hitting you once and resulting in you dropping your whole setup on the ground. That was pretty fun.

What isn't fun is that you'd think he'd let you alone after obliterating one of your limbs, yet he keeps coming at you. He may hit you twice and let you rot on the floor for the rest of the game, he may hit you 6 times and put you on the meat hook enough times that your character probably looks like a running bloody cheese by now.

And once you're on the meat hook, all you can do is watch, watch as your "teammates" aren't even looking at your direction, or feel the dozens stabs of a killer that for some reasons has taken quite a like of you, waiting until your character gets empaled, giving you at last the sweet release of death.

Don't buy this game, and if my review isn't convincing you, try to find the ones of the players with thousands of hours and still not recommending the game, treating it more of an addictive toxic relationship than an experience.
Elite game. Despite the bugs and all that, no other games of the same genre comes close to DBD. Definitely should buy especially with friends to play with.

垃圾ui，垃圾动作,玩人类受伤跟拉肚子一样,玩屠夫遇到游戏地图,这是什么垃圾重置啊,安全板巨多,几乎没博弈板,还有什么沙口屠夫,这是恐怖游戏?我玩人遇到这个屠夫得笑出声,玩家建议到底有没有用,匹配机制是哪个程序员写的算法?我刚开始屠夫20段匹到4红段,现在红段可以匹到3绿一紫,红段全去给萌新抗压了是吧,高层换人了?什么垃圾地图设计师,什么垃圾屠夫设计,到现在还在缝合,各种陈年bug不修外挂不管,好做快乐时刻是吧,成天出新皮肤不如多修bug,你们到底玩自己的游戏吗?还有一些玩家,买了游戏就以为自己了不起,玩个两三给小时就去别人视频指点江山,被喷了云玩家就说自己有但不玩,这有什么区别呢?还会荣耀地在视频下刷云玩家集合,也只能看看别人虐菜,乱刷下饭了,只能祝这些垃圾云玩家早点4000+,要饭圈滚回你们的垃圾窝,别我看个视频都能给我看到晦气ky,你们全家还好吗?

I could tolerate some bugs, heck it was still fun to play. But several month ago devs started shitting out some questionable stuff. Killers even in rank 1 are mostly face campers and tunnelers off the hook, it became almost impossible to enjoy solo Q (yes I don't have friends), then when you switch to Killer, you are swarmed by rank 1 SWF sweat squads starting at rank 10. No ban system for trolls, sandbaggers and Killers who kick you out of the match in 2 minutes, just because their mother didn't love them enough, and there is nothing you can do, moreover you get punished for that by the game itself, because fuck you, derank bitch, because being altruistic actually gets you camped too. SO the only thing I enjoyed lately were Archives, because I had some goal + pipping after match always feelsgoodman, that's my win.
BUT they fucking managed to fuck us solo q people even MORE. Fuck the UI shit, the fucking pipping and emblem bug for survivors along with FUCKED UP hitboxes killed everything I had left for this bitch ass fuck fest of a game.
DON'T RECOMMEND IT. LEAVE AND NEVER COME BACK!!!! SAVE YOUR SANITY!!!
Разработчики и вправду постарались над обновой
死妈设计师是不是肠胃不好把脑子拉出去了。更新完玩了一小时，愣是玩出脑溢血。好好的一盘棋能给下臭了，弱智游戏越更新越离谱。UI 就不说了，他妈这个刀气是认真的吗？隔着五十米外都能给我摁倒，砍到我的屁了？人物动作更新得跟脑瘫一样，直直的站在那，等着屠夫来干死你是吗。后面拿着大砍刀追你，前面还就不紧不慢的逛街。煞笔设计师，我在你妈坟头跳社会摇，把你妈吓得从棺材里蹦起来给我鼓掌。

В ДАННЫЙ МОМЕНТ НЕ СОВЕТУЮ ПОКУПАТЬ ИГРУ ЕСЛИ ВАМ ЗАШЕЛ ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ ЗА СУРВА,А ЗА МАНА ТЕПЕРЬ МОЖНО ЕБАТЬ НА ЛЮБОМ РАНГЕ ИЗ ЗА СЛОМАННЫХ ХИТБОКСОВ  КОНЧЕННЫХ АНИМАЦИЙ. ИГРА ПОЛНЫЙ МУСОР ХОТЬ МНЕ ОНА НРАВИЛАСЬ А ТЕПЕРЬ ЭХХ... У МЕНЯ ПРОСТО СЛОВ НЕТ КАК ЖЕ РАЗРАБЫ УЕБАЛИ ЭТУ ИГРУ. ВСЕМ УДАЧИ В ЭТОЙ КОНЧЕННОЙ ПОМОЙКЕ!
найс баги после обновы: выкидывает с лобби, кривая анимация, сломанные хитбоксы и ранкед. Хуета одним словом. А так прикольная конечно, с друзьями по фану побегать можно.
